name: A blurry vision of an ordinary man
description:
Originally the sequence is for Vague's album design "Footsteps LP" https://vaguejkt.bandcamp.com/album/footsteps", the sequence is for the sleeve, this one is the first time i animated it.

Originally it's from a single image, during scanning (used a very old scanner from 2003), i move the paper from left to right, to get the wobble effects.
